text: El Hajj Aboubacar Somparé (31 August 1944 – 2 November 2017)Urgent/ Aboubacar Somparé, l’ex-président de l’Assemblée Nationale est mort was a Guinean politician. He was President of the National Assembly of Guinea from 2002 to 2008. He was previously Guinea's Ambassador to France from 1978 to 1984 and was Secretary-General of the Unity and Progress Party (PUP) from 1995 to 2002. He served as Interim President of Guinea from 22 December 2008 through 24 December 2008.Djibril S. Diakite, "A long way to go" , The Africa Report, 2008. Somparé died on 2 November 2017 in Ratoma, Guinea at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Presidents of Guinea
title: Aboubacar Somparé
